name: Rick and Morty: Blips and Chitz Old School
name_original: Rick and Morty: Blips and Chitz Old School
description:
On a routine trip to Blips and Chitz, Rick's portal gun malfunctioned, trapping Rick and Morty in a retro 80's arcade dimension! The only way out is through!

Help Rick and Morty escape by leading them through classic arcade levels including Pac Man, Donkey Kong, Space Invaders and Qbert!
